5D20E70A.Line1.B2A59: Hmm, a lucky find! It's been some time since I've seen a geode like this. You'll need a special acid flux to get to the gems inside.

F715608C.Line3.B2A59: Check with Idania. She just received a shipment of some rare reagents from Hawezar. You're welcome to use our tools to apply the flux and extract your gems.
